text: ISLAMABAD/ANANTNAG(Kashmiri: اننت ناگ /Anaṁtnāg/, meaning abode of springs and lakes), is a city and a municipality located in the Anantnag District in the union territory of Jammu and Kashmir, India. About 180,000 people live in Anantnag. Anantnag is the third largest city of the Indian administered Jammu and Kashmir by population and largest according to area. It is also regarded as the commercial and financial capital of the Valley of Kashmir. It is the largest business and trading center of the valley. it is also known as Islamabad. ==References== Category:Cities in Jammu and Kashmir
title: Anantnag
